title: PASSWORD
onboarding_1: Find out the secret word in Password!
onboarding_2: You have 6 tries to guess the word of the day.
onboarding_3: You can send a guess by typing a word and clicking in the SEND button.
onboarding_4: When submitting a guess, you receive hints for the secret word. The green color indicates that the letter is correct.
onboarding_5: The yellow color indicates that the letter exists in the word, but is in the wrong position. The gray letters do not exist in the secret word.
onboarding_6: Use the hints to make better guesses, which will help you find out the secret word.
settings_text: Select the language you want to play in:
quit_text: Are you sure you want to quit? You are so close!
invalid_word: The word you submitted is invalid.
unfilled_word: You need to type all the letters.
